name: VA.HU.WE - Multiplayer Russian Roulette
description:
VA.HU.WE - Multiplayer Russian Roulette Vampires vs Humans vs Werewolf 

This is a 2-15 players multiplayer online deduction game, where the player has to find out who is on the same team. A gun will be passed around, it contains 1 bullet in a 6 round cylinder, so you have to be careful who you point your weapon to.

The game contains roles where it will help on the arguments development of the players to find out who is who.

There are 3 teams - The Humans, the vampires and the werewolf. 

Humans are skilled and some of them have other roles. Some of those roles are the seer and the swapper (more to come in the future).

Vampires know who the other vampires are at the beginning of the game.

Werewolf is always alone, it needs more shots to be killed and it can see who the vampires are at the beginning of the game

Be Careful, roles can be swapped by the swapper. You only know the initial role, not your current one.

This is a deduction game, you have to talk to each other and find out who each other is and pull the trigger to try to eliminate your enemies.
